Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Seattle to Detroit on 2/2/1988 (Going to SEA: P Greg Swindell, P Dennis Cook, P Colin Ward, C Mackey Sasser. Going to DET: P Greg Hibbard, 3B Gary Sheffield, 3B Jim Presley, LF Gorma
n Thomas, RF Tom Brunansky)...
Had first career hit on 5/11/1989, off Andy Hawkins (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1989, off Danny Jackson (KC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1990, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1990, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Boston on 9/16/1990...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Boston on 9/16/1990...
Hit for the cycle against Seattle on 5/21/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1991, hitting .520 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
